text: Paris is an unincorporated community in Jefferson and Jennings counties, Indiana, in the United States. ==History== A post office called Paris was established in 1820, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1841. The community was named for Paris, in France. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Jefferson County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Jennings County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Paris, Indiana
